menu.title: Our Stations
menu.description: You want to hear a song, but no moderator is live? No problem!
menu.description2: Click on the station and request your song. Wait a moment, and it will be played.

streamSelected.title: Stream selected
streamSelected.text: The stream has been started successfully.

enabled.name: Enable Addon
enabled.description: Enable or disable the EvilRadio Addon

radioMenuKeybind.name: Radio Menu Keybind
radioMenuKeybind.description: Key to open the radio menu

volume.name: Volume
volume.description: The volume of the radio stream (0-100%)

usageBasedSorting.name: Usage-based Sorting
usageBasedSorting.description: Sort stations based on usage frequency

autoStart.name: Auto-Start Settings
autoStart.description: Configure automatic start of the last stream

mode.name: Auto-Start Mode
mode.description: Choose when the stream should automatically start

delay.name: Auto-Start Delay
delay.description: Delay in seconds before automatically starting the stream (0-10 seconds)

reloadStreams.name: Reload Streams
reloadStreams.description: Reloads the stream list from the server

resetStreamUsageCount.name: Reset Usage Statistics
resetStreamUsageCount.description: Resets the usage statistics of the streams
